g.text: AWS EC2 G7e - NVIDIA Blackwell Architecture
Data never leaves EU | EU jurisdiction only
Target: Financial Services | Healthcare | Public Sector | Telecommunications
Google Cloud Asia Pacific Regions - Bangkok NEW!
Developer credentials theft, Code repo access
Mitigation: Extension audit, Tunnel monitoring, EDR rules
Cloud Storage or Physical Remote Site
DMZ to App: Specific ports only (443, 8080)
App to Data: Database port only (5432, 3306)
Key Insight: Kubernetes is now the de facto "Operating System" for AI
DevSecOps Implications: K8s security skills are now mandatory | AI workload protection is critical
Source: CNCF 2025 Annual Cloud Native Survey | January 2026

svg.text: Twodragon Tech Blog | Cloud Architecture Diagrams | 2026-01-22
